group_1.textRight: I've worked it all out! Elementary, my dear@Miss Miyako!
The culprit is...
The culprit...is...!
It's this! A baseball!
An understandable reaction. But I'm serious!
This baseball is the culprit. It's what hit @you on the back of the head.
See, among all the footprints that showed@up...there was this one circular mark.
The size, and most importantly, the stitch@marks, match this baseball perfectly!
There was a ball mark right near where you@were hit, Hinano!
Then, it looks like it rolled over here, @and stopped over there in the corner...
The baseball club is practicing outside on@the field. You can hear them right now!
And this room...is facing that field!
Most likely a child hit a ball and it just@happened to sail right through the window!
From there it had a clear path right to your@head!

group_1.textLeft: So that's what it was! No wonder there @was no evidence of the culprit!

group_1.textRight: U-um, excuse me!
I think, maybe, a ball flew in here a bit@ago.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, here you go. Try to be more careful@next time!

group_1.textRight: Will do. Thanks! See ya!
Aw, what mature manners! Even though you@look the same age as him.
Oh, no, nothing! [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_041.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
Aaanyway! This means the case is closed!

group_1.textLeft: A baseball... It snuck right up on me...

group_1.textRight: Ha ha ha...at least it wasn't a Witch!
Anyway, guess I'd better head back.
I'm going on a shopping spree to get myself@a brand new outfit for tomorrow!

group_1.textLeft: An outfit... You going on a date?

group_1.textRight: [chara:200401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?! What?! O-of course not!

group_1.textLeft: It's written all over your face! [chara:300301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300301:cheek_0][chara:300301:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]Well, if @you're going on a date...
Take this present as thanks for solving@the case for me!

group_1.textRight: A present?

group_1.textLeft: I prepared all these fragrances to use in@the experiments today.
If you mix this one here with this one...you@get a perfume you can't buy in any store!

group_1.textRight: Whoa...it smells sooo nice!

group_1.textLeft: It's a super special perfume! Don't worry, @of course it's safe for use on human skin.
If you use it, your guy is gonna go crazy@for you!

group_1.textRight: Seriously?! Thank you! I'll be really@careful when I use it then!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Good luck on your date!

group_1.textRight: It's not a date...[chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200401:cheek_2][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]ah, what the heck! See ya!

group_1.narration: I went out of my way to help@someone, and look what happened!
I got this really amazing perfume!@Now I just gotta go buy my outfit!

group_1.textCenter: Leave everything to Detective Sayaka!@Ask me anything ya like!
